msubsection.title: cat
msubsection.p: Get the content of a file on repository.

attribute.name: destFile
attribute.default: The name of the file on the url placed in the ant project's basedir

attribute.name: url
attribute.doc: Url of the file in repository

attribute.name: revision
attribute.doc:
Possible values are:
a date with the format as specified in dateFormatter attribute
a revision number
HEAD, BASE, COMMITED or PREV
